text:
@SteveGuest @realDonaldTrump TX & FL now have to engage in remedial COVID-19 shutdowns because their leaders were too weak to stand up to 45,and too self-interested in keeping their base &donors happy,to put the health of their resident first.

Unforgivable failure. The impact will be FAR worse because of it https://t.co/sRjCBUcilZ
